headline: Rockwell Powers Up Lucid's Saudi Factory In A Big EV Push
summary: On Wednesday, Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE:ROK) said it had deepened its collaboration with Lucid Group (NASDAQ:LCID) to support the automaker’s expanding manufacturing facility in Saudi Arabia. The plant, located in King Abdullah Economic City (KAEC), represents a milestone as the Kingdom’s first vehicle manufacturing site and aligns with Saudi Arabia’s broader industrial development ambitions under Vision 2030.
